meanings.definition: To classify or arrange in a new or different category.
meanings.sent1: She recategorized her books by color to make them look pretty on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The librarian recategorized the books by genre for easier access.
meanings.sent3: The teacher recategorized the students into teams based on their favorite colors.
meanings.sent4: The artist recategorized her paintings, turning them into a vibrant rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The gardener recategorized the flowers, creating a beautiful rainbow garden.

meanings.definition: To reorganize or rearrange into a different group or classification.
meanings.sent1: He recategorized his toys into separate bins to keep them organized.
meanings.sent2: The manager recategorized the files to improve efficiency in the office.
meanings.sent3: The chef recategorized the ingredients, causing a mix-up in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The student recategorized his notes, turning chaos into order.
meanings.sent5: The designer recategorized the clothes, creating a new fashion trend.
